originalText.text: Taking lessons with Justin has been an amazing, fun first exposure to pop singing instruction for me. I'm so proud of the growth and progress I've experienced working with him. I've sang in choirs for years, beginning in high school, and I've always sang in a more classical style.  Justin introduced me to styles of singing that weren't really part of my performing style before like belting, crooning, and broadway and he worked with me from scratch.  He helped me select great music. He was patient and encouraging with me as he helped me develop my ear to differentiate between different vocal styles and qualities and to learn how to move between them.  Justin introduced me to more vocal exercises to help me think not just about my range, but about having a more consistent sound across my range and to continue good vocal quality into the higher end of my range.  Before working with Justin, I had not been thinking about these factors and now I work on them regularly.  The impact on my singing has been dramatic and has increased my enjoyment and appreciation of so much music.  Thank you, Justin!

originalText.text: Justin is such a kind and enthusiastic teacher that puts his students first. My son loves his lessons and has grown so much in just a few months. Honestly, since I’m not a musician I was a little worried about him taking lessons since I didn’t know what to expect. But through working with Justin, he went from a complete beginner to being able to read the music and sounding so much better. I can’t recommend Justin’s teaching enough!

originalText.text: I have learned so much working with Justin, and I would recommend him as a top mentor in voice, piano, and music theory across Union County. I have never worked with someone as motivated and passionate about my growth. He is helping me prepare for my college auditions, and I am certain I am in the best hands. Besides his intelligence and skill, his outgoing nature makes his students excited to grow and feel comfortable learning advanced topics, which other teachers may present in a much more overwhelming nature.

originalText.text: Justin is a fantastic vocal instructor with a great background in music which enables him to teach students using different methods according to their talent level.  Would highly recommend Justin for vocal lessons!

originalText.text:
Mr. Witwick is an extremely understanding teacher as he is pleasantly nice and patient in helping our son learn. He listens to our son's concerns and quickly makes adjustments according to his progress. His style of teaching is solely unique to him; he makes things simplistic and in a way anybody can understand.

Our son initially went into the course with a closed attitude but after a couple lessons he opened up and looked forward to his lessons with him.  We're glad to report that Mr. J has helped our son's self esteem grow expontientally and he's helped our son become excited about starting a new project using his new-found talents. We cannot express our upmost gratitude for his dedication to our son's aspirations.

We highly recommend Mr. J (Witwick) as an instructor.  We are absolutely pleased with both the personal & musical growth we've seen in our son over the past nine months. He has been an incredible asset to our son's passion & education!
